headline: Diamond Hill Large Cap Fund Purchased Cooper Companies (COO) Betting on the Resilient Contact Lens Industry
summary: Diamond Hill Capital, an investment management company, released its “Large Cap Fund” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Equity markets continued their upward momentum in Q4, with the Russell 1000 Value Index increasing 3.8%.
